viewUsuarioClave: select U."Id",  U."Usuario", U."Email", XUC."Clave"  from sistemas.usuario U  inner join ( select UC.* from ( select "UsuarioId", "Clave", MAX("Id") as "Id" from sistemas.usuario_clave uc  where uc."EstadoId" = 1 group by "UsuarioId", "Clave" ) SUC  inner join sistemas.usuario_clave UC on SUC."Id" = UC."Id" ) XUC on U."Id" = XUC."UsuarioId"  where U."EstadoId" = 1
